text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I am Muhammad a software engineer
here at the AWS office in Boston today
I'll show you how to create a new
private repost for your organization
using AWS repost private let's get
started first make sure that you have an
Enterprise support plan or Enterprise
onramp support plan and that you have
the required permissions to create a
private repost you can find more details
in the linked article next you must have
an AWS organization set up with your
accounts as members if you don't have
one already let's create a new
organization open the AWS organizations
console choose create an
organization follow the prompts to
verify your email and to add member
accounts now enable iws identity and
access management identity Center for
your accounts in the same region where
you want the private repost to be set up
open the IIM identity center console
follow the steps to enable it for your
organization configure your identity
source and manage permissions for the IM
am identity center console now let's
create the private repost open the
repost private
console choose create private repost
select the pricing tier know that you
can only create one free tier private
repost enter a name Des description and
custom
subdomain your data is encrypted by
default with a key that AWS owns and
manages for you to choose a different
key from your account you can customize
your encryption settings you can also
enable service access for support case
integration by providing an IIM role you
can find more details about the required
permissions for this role in the
article choose create this
repost it can take around 30 minutes for
your private repost to be created and be
available online you will receive an
email in your account email when the
private repost is online after you
receive this email you can access the
private repost using the AWS generated
subdomain listed under settings so now
you know how to create a new private
repost for your organization using AWS
repost
private thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
